attributes.action: To re-instate Debbie Ryan live on Sunday evenings on Gaydar radio and replace the recorded muppets installed in her place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The outrageous, out spoken Debbie Ryan has been removed from her live Sunday slot and has been replaced by a recording of a couple of muppets.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
